meanings.definition: An institution providing medical and surgical treatment and nursing care for sick or injured people.
meanings.sent1: Many people go to hospitals when they are feeling very sick.
meanings.sent2: The hospitals in our city are always busy with patients.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bicycle go to the hospital? It had two tired wheels!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a hospital for all the love she had to give.
meanings.sent5: The hospital smelled like disinfectant and hope.

meanings.definition: A charitable institution for the education of the young.
meanings.sent1: The hospital provides education and care for children in need.
meanings.sent2: Donations help support the hospital's mission to educate the youth.
meanings.sent3: Why did the book go to the hospital? It needed a spine!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a hospital for knowledge and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The hospital for children was filled with laughter and learning.
